description: Supply of Purging Unit for Air, Liquid Oxygen Storage.
full_summary:
================================reambleInformation regarding the Purge Unit government tender announcement can be found below.

**Solicitation Details**

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01030861 (Amendment: 1)
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237587/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-09T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information**: [Debbie Bergeron, debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

**Project Details**

* **Delivery Location**: 100 Wing, RCAF Station Edmonton
* **Delivery Period**: August 2023
* **Items Required**: Two (2) purging units, GSIN: N3655, NSN: 3655-00-987-2586, with the following specifications:
	+ Air liquid oxygen storage part number 4000, NCAGE 83790

**Contract Guidelines**

* **Notice of Proposed Procurement**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments**

* **Bid Solicitation Document (English)**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/28/f1557d7ed54272d3e8603e830a33554e/237587_bid_purge_unit_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/28/f1557d7ed54272d3e8603e830a33554e/237587_bid_purge_unit_en.pdf)
* **Bid Solicitation Document (French
